external_games.name: DiRT Rally 2.0 - Killarney International Raceway, South Africa (Rallycross Track)

name: DiRT Rally 2.0: Killarney International Raceway, South Africa (Rallycross Track)
summary: The Killarney circuit is located in Cape Town and was added to the WRX calendar in 2017. The inaugural race was won by Johan Kristoffersson for PSRX, after the notably action packed Semi Finals and Finals.
